parameter-group.name: vad
parameter-group.label: Voice Activity Detection
parameter-group.description: Configure the VAD mechanisim used to isolate single phrases to feed whisper with.

parameter-group.name: grammar
parameter-group.label: Grammar
parameter-group.description: Define a grammar to improve transcrptions.

parameter.name: modelName
parameter.label: Model Name
parameter.description: Model name without extension.

parameter.name: preloadModel
parameter.label: Preload Model
parameter.description: Keep the model loaded. If the parameter is set to true, the model will be reloaded only on configuration updates. If the model is not loaded when needed, the service will try to load it. If the parameter is set to false, the model will be loaded and unloaded on each run.

parameter.name: singleUtteranceMode
parameter.label: Single Utterance Mode
parameter.description: When enabled recognition stops listening after a single utterance.

parameter.name: minSeconds
parameter.label: Min Transcription Seconds
parameter.description: Min transcription seconds passed to whisper.

parameter.name: maxSeconds
parameter.label: Max Transcription Seconds
parameter.description: Seconds to force transcription before silence detection.

parameter.name: initSilenceSeconds
parameter.label: Initial Silence Seconds
parameter.description: Max initial seconds of silence to discard transcription.

parameter.name: maxSilenceSeconds
parameter.label: Max Silence Seconds
parameter.description: Seconds of silence to trigger transcription.

parameter.name: removeSilence
parameter.label: Remove Silence
parameter.description: Remove silence frames from the beginning and end of the audio.

parameter.name: stepSeconds
parameter.label: Audio Step
parameter.description: Audio step for the voice activity detection.

parameter.name: vadSensitivity
parameter.label: Voice Activity Detection Sensitivity
parameter.description: Percentage in range 0-1 of voice activity in each audio step analyzed to consider it as voice.

parameter.name: vadMode
parameter.label: Voice Activity Detection Mode
parameter.description: Available VAD modes. Quality is the most likely to detect voice.

parameter.name: vadStep
parameter.label: Voice Activity Detector Step
parameter.description: Audio milliseconds passed to the voice activity detector. Defines how much times the voice activity detector is executed per audio step.

parameter.name: threads
parameter.label: Threads
parameter.description: Number of threads used by whisper. (0 to use host max threads)

parameter.name: audioContext
parameter.label: Audio Context
parameter.description: Overwrite the audio context size. (0 to use whisper default context size)

parameter.name: samplingStrategy
parameter.label: Sampling strategy
parameter.description: Sampling strategy used.

parameter.name: beamSize
parameter.label: Beam Size
parameter.description: Beam Size configuration for sampling strategy Bean Search.

parameter.name: greedyBestOf
parameter.label: Greedy Best Of
parameter.description: Best Of configuration for sampling strategy Greedy. (-1 for unlimited)

parameter.name: temperature
parameter.label: Temperature
parameter.description: Temperature threshold.

parameter.name: initialPrompt
parameter.label: Initial Prompt
parameter.description: Initial prompt to feed whisper with.

parameter.name: openvinoDevice
parameter.label: OpenVINO Device
parameter.description: Initialize OpenVINO encoder. (built-in binaries do not support OpenVINO, this has no effect)

parameter.name: speedUp
parameter.label: Speed Up
parameter.description: Speed up audio by x2. (reduced accuracy)

parameter.name: useGPU
parameter.label: Use GPU
parameter.description: Enables GPU usage. (built-in binaries do not support GPU usage, this has no effect)

parameter.name: useGrammar
parameter.label: Use Grammar
parameter.description: Enables grammar usage.

parameter.name: grammarPenalty
parameter.label: Grammar Penalty
parameter.description: Penalty for non grammar tokens when using grammar.

parameter.name: grammarLines
parameter.label: Grammar
parameter.description: Grammar to use in GBNF format. (BNF variant used by whisper.cpp).

parameter.name: noResultsMessage
parameter.label: No Results Message
parameter.description: Message to be told when no results. (Empty for disabled)

parameter.name: errorMessage
parameter.label: Error Message
parameter.description: Message to be told when an error has happened. (Empty for disabled)

parameter.name: createWAVRecord
parameter.label: Create WAV Record
parameter.description: Create WAV audio record on each whisper execution.

parameter.name: recordSampleFormat
parameter.label: Record Sample Format
parameter.description: Defines the sample type and bit-size used by the created WAV audio record.

parameter.name: enableWhisperLog
parameter.label: Enable Whisper Log
parameter.description: Emit whisper.cpp library logs as add-on debug logs.
